comment.author: 67012890@N05
comment._content: I believe this is the old Treasury Building on NE corner of King William St and Flinders st, Adelaide. maps.google.com.au/maps?q=King+William+Street,+South+Aust... Apparently there was a tunnel which ran under KW Street to the Post Office which sits on the Western side of KW Street.

comment.author: 92601516@N02
comment._content: It is now the Adina Apartment Hotel Adelaide Treasury (previously known as Medina Grand Adelaide Treasury) located adjacent to the Town Hall and opposite the General Post Office overlooking Victoria Square.
